goal: Set up Canvas pages for the individual project.
Create a GitHub repository for the project.
Spend time understanding the project requirements.
Build a Prototype: Implement the time logging feature (DATE, FROM, TO, TASK, TAG).
Ensure that activities can be recorded and saved in Firebase.
Implement the query functionality allowing users to search activities by date, task, or tag.
Test the integration between time logging and querying functionalities.
Implement the report generation feature to show activities over a selected time range (e.g., 2021/01/01 to 2022/01/01).
Build Version 1: Complete the first version of the application, including logging, querying, and reporting features.
Perform unit tests and integration tests for all implemented features.
Conduct regression testing to ensure that new features do not break existing functionality.
Prepare for the final version by addressing any bugs or issues.
Build Final Version: Finalize the application with all features working and bugs resolved.
Submit the final project, including the zipped GitHub repository, documentation, and project presentation on Canvas.
